amendment.description: To require the Secretary of Homeland Security to allocate formula-based grants to State and local governments based on an assessment of threats and vulnerabilities and other factors that the Secretary considers appropriate, in accordance with the recommendation of the 9/11 Commission.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 3631 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 54 - 39. Record Vote Number: 183.

Amendment SA 3631 proposed by Senator Clinton. (consideration: CR S9171-9172, S9173-9174, S9206, S9208; text CR S9171) To require the Secretary of Homeland Security to allocate formula-based grants to State and local governments based on an assessment of threats and vulnerabilities and other factors that the Secretary considers appropriate, in accordance with the recommendation of the 9/11 Commission.
